channel.title: What 07 server was this?
channel.description:
Back when moparscape was a buggy mess, and the servers were laggy as hell I played in a server where you started out in Edgeville and there was 3 portals. You clicked an individual portal for strength, attack and defense exp.
I think the name was CrystalX or something like that. (not crisisx)
When you teleported to the house next to romeo and juliets house in Falador, there was lesser demons that you could kill.
I played it again in 2010. Now I forgot about it >=\

item.title: What 07 server was this?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:15, topic:425353”][quote author=IOWNzEZIMADUH link=topic=528016.msg3850902#msg3850902 date=1324001122]

Wow, oldfags would only remember servers that you clicked stuff to get XP.

Yep, I’m an oldfag. And every year, I become more of an oldfag… so far, I’ve had this account for 5 years, 6 on july 27, 2012, which I take some pride in. ;D

Just because you have an old account doesn’t mean you’re necessarily an oldfag.

I’m an oldfag because I started playing RSPS’s when they barely came out along with playing RS for a long time

No I just meant the part about your account. Even if it is 5 yrs old that doesn’t really make a difference.
[/quote]But the forum came out in 2006, so I’m pretty oldfag imo.

I could have joined the day after it came out, but doesn’t mean I’m an oldfag. It’s all about the memory of things that happen.
Blackbook, SCAR, first RSPS (that sucked … lol)[/quote]First RSPS’s were the best…

Read full topic

item.title: What 07 server was this?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Well, moparscape is just a client, and the client isn’t a buggy mess. The server, CrystalX, is the buggy mess.
Why do you want to know what server this was? It sounds like it took a good hour to recreate it, using allstar as a base.

Read full topic
